name: SANDY CLAUS RETURNS
description:
Sandy is delivering presents to all the children in the world - but he needs your help

Join Sandy in his latest adventure. The night is rising. Children are sleeping all over the world and it's up to Sandy to put them to sleep. You must navigate the dream houses and use special techniques to get valuable tools like Magic Bell, Super Z, Hyper Skis, and Joly. Do you have what it takes?

  • 4 new worlds to explore
  • Lovable characters in a globe-trotting epic
  • An all-new killer soundtrack
  • A fateful struggle between ultimate good and ultimate evil

In the faithless waste Sandy Claus left us...

… this Christmas Sandy Claus Returns
